meanings.definition: To make beautiful or more beautiful.
meanings.sent1: She beautifies her garden with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The artist beautifies the canvas with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent3: The magic wand beautifies everything it touches.
meanings.sent4: Kindness beautifies the world like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: Her smile beautifies even the gloomiest days.

meanings.definition: To enhance the appearance of something.
meanings.sent1: The new curtains beautify the room.
meanings.sent2: Adding a fresh coat of paint beautifies the house.
meanings.sent3: His jokes always beautify the conversation.
meanings.sent4: Music beautifies the silence of the night.
meanings.sent5: The necklace beautifies her outfit elegantly.
